title: War of Wits
text: War of Wits is an annual on-spot strategy based competition for students of IIT Kharagpur organized by The KGPian Game Theory Society . The first edition WOW 1.0 was held on Saturday, 30th March 2013 in association with Consulting Club, Vinod Gupta School of Management . More than 300 students participated in the event. The 2nd edition WOW 2.0 was organized on 3rd April 2015 and witnessed a participation of more than 350 students.
